original_text:
Shouts of joy and victory
    resound in the tents of the righteous:
“The Lord’s right hand has done mighty things!
korean_text: 의인들의 장막에는 기쁜 소리, 구원의 소리가 있음이여 여호와의 오른손이 권능을 베푸시며

sentences.original_text: resound in the tents of the righteous
The Lord's right hand has done mighty things!
